Uses of Class
asgn2Passengers.PassengerException

  • Packages that use PassengerException 
    Package Description
    asgn2Aircraft  
    asgn2Passengers  

    • Uses of PassengerException in asgn2Aircraft

      Methods in asgn2Aircraft that throw PassengerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Aircraft.cancelBooking(Passenger p, int cancellationTime)
      Method to remove passenger from the aircraft - passenger must have a confirmed seat prior to entry to this method.
      void Aircraft.confirmBooking(Passenger p, int confirmationTime)
      Method to add a Passenger to the aircraft seating.
      void Aircraft.flyPassengers(int departureTime)
      Method to finalise the aircraft seating on departure.

    • Uses of PassengerException in asgn2Passengers

      Methods in asgn2Passengers that throw PassengerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Passenger.cancelSeat(int cancellationTime)
      Transition passenger to New
      PRE: isConfirmed(this)
      POST: isNew(this) AND this.getBookingTime() == cancellationTime
      cancelSeat: Confirmed -> New; up until departureTime Cancellation returns booking to New state; Booking time is adjusted to this cancellation time and Passenger is processed as a new booking.
      void Passenger.confirmSeat(int confirmationTime, int departureTime)
      Transition passenger to Confirmed seat
      PRE: isNew(this) OR inQueue(this)
      POST: isConfirmed(this) AND this.getConfirmationTime() == confirmationTime AND
      this.getDepartureTime() == departureTime
      confirmSeat: New -> Confirmed confirmSeat: Queued -> Confirmed; up until departureTime if isQueued(this), then POST: this.getExitQueueTime() == confirmationTime
      void Passenger.flyPassenger(int departureTime)
      Transition passenger to Flown
      PRE: isConfirmed(this)
      POST: isFlown(this) AND this.getDepartureTime() == departureTime
      flyPassenger:Confirmed -> Flown; finalised on departureTime
      void Passenger.queuePassenger(int queueTime, int departureTime)
      Transition passenger to Queued
      PRE: isNew(this)
      POST: isQueued(this) AND this.getEnterQueueTime() == queueTime AND
      this.getDepartureTime == departureTime
      queuePassenger: New -> Queued Queue on booking if seat is not available.
      void Passenger.refusePassenger(int refusalTime)
      Transition passenger to Refused
      PRE: isNew(this) OR isQueued(this)
      POST: isRefused(this) refusePassenger:New -> Refused refusePassenger:Queued -> Refused; finalised on departureTime if isQueued(this), then POST: this.getExitQueueTime() == refusalTime
      Constructors in asgn2Passengers that throw PassengerException 
      Constructor and Description
      Business(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      Business Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed Business Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.
      Economy(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      Economy Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed Economy Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.
      First(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      First Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed First Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.
      Passenger(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      Passenger Constructor On creation, Passenger is in a New state.
      Premium(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      Premium Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed Premium Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.
